name: POSER (Skelteon)
description:
Poser is a fun minigame about matching poses.

Match the left character with the right using the controls:

  • Z and X move your legs
  • Left and Right arrows move your arms
  • Up changes your color
  • Down submits your current pose (hardcore difficulty only

3 modes to play:

  • Sprint: Select a number of poses to match and sprint to the finish!
  • Survival: Complete matches to add more seconds onto the timer and see how many you can rack up before time runs out!
  • Endless: No stress, no requirements, no panic-inducing timers; just relax and pose the cute little guy at your own pace.
